mobile.name: pitbeast pit-beast
mobile.long_description: The big, ugly pit-beast is standing here sizing you up.
mobile.description: Ick... what a disgusting creature! It is black and green and slimy and it is drooling everywhere... looks mean too.

mobile.name: newbie monster
mobile.long_description: The newbie monster stands here looking confused. Kill him! Kill him!
mobile.description: What an odd looking little beast. He looks harmless, but you never can tell. He is only about 4 feet tall, but he pretty muscular looking... maybe you should ask if he needs help? Nah... kill him.

mobile.name: dragon baby
mobile.long_description: Someone's little pet dragon has gotten loose, and is sniffing about here.
mobile.description: Awwww... how cute! A little baby dragon. He's about 3 feet long and you just want to cuddle him to death... no, you really want to kill him to tell the truth. But, remember, even a little dragon can be a big problem.

mobile.name: keeper guard monster
mobile.long_description: The Newbie Guard is here wondering where that dragon went.
mobile.description: The Guard also had the job of taking care of the Alchemist's pet dragon, but he doesn't seem to be doing a good job of it. He looks at you and says, 'Have you seen that dragon? Master will have my head if I don't find him.'

mobile.name: alchemist newbie
mobile.long_description: The Newbie Alchemist is here trying to make something.
mobile.description: He is a funny looking, furry little dude. He looks really busy trying to mix up a batch of something or other.

mobile.name: crawler creepy bug thing
mobile.long_description: A creepy little crawling thing is scuttling along the floor at your feet.
mobile.description: Yuck! If they'd ever clean this place maybe it wouldn't attract vermin like this disgusting, little, six-legged, brown bug.

mobile.name: newbie zombie
mobile.long_description: A VERY gaunt looking newbie... it looks like a zombie!
mobile.description: This guy has been lost in here too long... it is more zombie than man now. You would feel sorry for it, but it is moving in to attack!

mobile.name: quasit imp thing
mobile.long_description: A funny little imp-like thing (a quasit perhaps?) is sneaking about here.
mobile.description: Little green, vaguely humoniod shaped creature, with a long pointed tail. It is hard to say because before you ever get a good look at it, it darts back into the shadows.

mobile.name: minotaur
mobile.long_description: The Great Minotaur is wondering just what you'll taste like.
mobile.description: A massive man, with the head of a bull. He looks as strong as bull too, but not nearly as smart. Actually, now that you consider it... he looks a heck of a lot meaner than any bull you have ever seen... and he is coming this way!

mobile.name: spectre ghost
mobile.long_description: The dark spectre is lurking in the shadows.
mobile.description: The soul of a long since passed on adventurer... it lurks here waiting for a chance to bring death to any who cross its path.

mobile.name: newbie annoying jerk
mobile.long_description: A newbie is here annoying the hell out of you.
mobile.description: What a jerk! He won't shut up, and he keeps making the most irritating comments about everything. Better silence him with cold, tempered steel MUHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

mobile.name: newbie clueless moron
mobile.long_description: A newbie is here looking terribly confused.
mobile.description: What a moron! Every question that is answered in the help files, he will ask and he will probably ask 2 or 3 times too. This guy just doesn't get it, best put him out of his misery.

mobile.name: newbie talkative
mobile.long_description: A newbie is here talking a lot.
mobile.description: Well, at least this gal seems pretty cool. Talks a lot, but she's a friendly, interesting sort. Seems to have a clue what she's doing also, unlike some others you might see.

mobile.name: newbie lost
mobile.long_description: A newbie is here wandering about aimlessly.
mobile.description: Hmmm... looks like he has been around a while, but he wandered a little too far from home this time. Don't think he knows quite where he is, maybe you should help him out?

mobile.name: newbie smart
mobile.long_description: A newbie is here, and he looks quite sure of himself.
mobile.description: Here is a guy who has it all together. Nice equipment too, must have read the help files, Eh?
